interview_metadata.general_comments: Rick Rule discusses the temporary impact of Middle Eastern conflicts on oil prices, emphasizing that true drivers for gold and silver are ongoing fiat currency debasement. He warns investors to avoid dilution from junior mining equity raises and stresses due diligence on company value vs. price. Rick systematically addresses and ranks a wide variety of oil, gold, uranium, and junior mining stocks, providing candid views on management, operational risks, valuation, ownership, and sector outlook. He previews the Natural Resources Investment Symposium as a key event for resource investors.
